feature.name: openhab-package-demo
feature.config: package = demo ui = dashboard,basic,paper,habpanel,restdocs misc = homekit,hueemulation binding = wemo,hue,sonos,ipp,astro,avmfritz,ntp persistence = rrd4j transformation = map

feature.name: openhab-package-simple
feature.config: package = simple ui = dashboard,paper,habpanel misc = ruleengine

feature.name: openhab-core-io-console-karaf
feature.description: Karaf Console support for SmartHome stuff

feature.name: openhab.tp-jmdns
feature.description: An implementation of multi-cast DNS in Java.

feature.name: openhab.tp-swagger-jax-rs-provider
feature.details: This feature is currently only for external usage by products and not used by openHAB Core itself.
